validation.less_than_equal: Input should be less than or equal to {le}

validation.string_too_long: String should have at most {max_length} characters

validation.tuple_type: Input should be a valid tuple

validation.bool_parsing: Input should be a valid boolean, unable to interpret input
validation.int_type: Input should be a valid integer

validation.int_parsing_size: Unable to parse input string as an integer, exceeds maximum size

validation.multiple_of: Input should be a multiple of {multiple_of}

validation.float_parsing: Input should be a valid number, unable to parse string as a number
validation.bytes_too_short: Data should have at least {min_length} bytes
validation.bytes_too_long: Data should have at most {max_length} bytes

validation.date_past: Date should be in the past
validation.date_future: Date should be in the future

validation.time_parsing: Input should be in a valid time format, {error}

validation.datetime_future: Input should be in the future
validation.timezone_naive: Input should not have timezone info
